title: Data Engineer
description: Responsible for developing a data project collecting massive amounts of data from the energy island in Denmark, from various providers. Tasks included receiving, performing quality control, and delivering data to developers. Utilized Spark and Databricks for scalability and flexibility in handling various data formats such as GDB, DFSU, segy, xtf. Supported geospatial data in Spark using Sedona (GeoSpark) for storing data in delta parquet format and improved read performance through spatial partitioning with geohashing.

title: Data Engineer
description: Developed a data validation component in data pipelines, used Python and Pandas, integrated with Azure Service Bus. Involved in data modeling for easy data consumption for analytics tools, using MS SQL Server, REST API. Implemented a mock DB in Python, SQLAlchemy and SQLite mimicking the production environment for testing API and pipeline changes. Developed data analytics and visualization tools using Python with Streamlit, Panel, Dash, and Bokeh.

title: IT Consultant
description: Worked on large-scale IT solution projects with multiple integrations. Utilized Oracle, Groovy, REST, and JavaScript for backend development. Employed Jira and Git for project management and version control, using the SCRUM framework.

title: Softwareudvikler
description: Developed geodata algorithms for data transformation, including processing of lidar data, and images. Developed an image classifier for identifying buildings in spectral orthophotos and a model for roadside height profiling and maintenance need analysis using lidar and GIS road data. Created plugins for QGIS using Qt and Python.

title: Engineer
description: Investigated the effort of switching communication chip on the IO boards in wind turbine control systems, involving programming the chip and exploring communication protocols like Ethercat, Profinet.

title: Instructor
description: Instructor in Electronics courses teaching basic analog circuit design.

title: Internship Electronics
description: Developed a PCB for loading solar panels aimed at testing the durability of solar panels for the automated Velux windows.
